channel.title: DeathNote Turbo - Hosted by Magnus (3/7) Kira Defeated! D3
channel.description:
## Welcome
[Follow the Global Forum Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515)
### Gameplay **By ‘DeathNote’ I mean the ANIME, not gamemode.** Days will be 20 minutes long. Nights will be 5 minutes long, or shorter if everyone submits their actions. Actions are done by messaging me. **Whoever has the DeathNote will be known as *Kira.* Kira can kill anyone, bypassing immunity, by writing down their *True Name.*** **To gain the DeathNote, you have to kill a player carrying it. You can also give yours away anonymously.**
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Executions end the day.
### After The Night You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** You slept peacefully You were shot and killed. You were shot but you survived. You died of a heart attack! You shot [x] and they died. You shot [x] but they survived.
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: **Ha! What Rolelist?** Players: 1. PoisonedSquid - Heart Attack 2. DirectorHail - Alive 3. Soulshade - Shot 4. James - Executed 5. Eevee - Alive 6. Sulit - Alive 7. JackTheWolfie - Executed

item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
And it wasn’t about killing Hail at last day.

Day before.

If they killed Soul, they would have all death notes and win.
If they killed You, we would outvote you on who gets death notes and there wouldn’t be a coin toss.

item.title: DeathNote Turbo - Hosted by Magnus (3/7) Kira Defeated! D3
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
Like let’s be honest.

You won cause Soul had to vote dispose on all death notes to keep his ability to kill.

After Yagami died, if those were kept by Sulit, he would have most death notes and Soul would lose his nightkill.

So Kira’s had to vote with police.

So yes, police’s wincon was easier than SPK.
And they still won only cause inactivity and coin toss.

FFS this is annoying.

Read full topic
